title: [Epidemiology] Retrospective COVID cohort study (n=118,078) finds the risks of hospitalization, intubation and death were significantly lower during Omicron period versus Delta. The risk of hospitalization was 8 times higher among unvaccinated persons (aHR 8.34; CI 7.25-9.60).

[Epidemiology] Large COVID outbreak in Hong Kong high rise building associated with airborne transmission via the "chimney effect" wherein air travels upwards from lower apartments on thermal gradients through light wells, dry plumbing, and passive floor ventilation
